Title: US Enters World War II
Description: US enters World War II following attacks on Pearl Harbor

Title: Political Violence
Description: Marked by the assasinations of MLK, JFK, and violence against anti-war protestors in Chicago

Title: First Female Justice
Description: Sandra Day O'Connor becomes the first woman on the U.S. Supreme Court

Title: The Patriot Act
Description: Patriot Act, increasing law enforcement agencies' ability to conduct searches in cases of suspected terrorism. Agencies were enforced
